commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Bas6cc8532"

diff:
"6cc8532 Update an obsolete comment in a NPOTB file.
diff --git a/netwerk/test/httpserver/test/test_name_scheme.js b/netwerk/test/httpserver/test/test_name_scheme.js
index 499839c..3ebe2df 100644
--- a/netwerk/test/httpserver/test/test_name_scheme.js
+++ b/netwerk/test/httpserver/test/test_name_scheme.js
@@ -36,9 +36,9 @@
  *
  * ***** END LICENSE BLOCK ***** */
 
-// requests for files beginning with an underscore are handled specially to
-// enable htaccess-like functionality without the need to explicitly disable
-// display of such files
+// requests for files ending with a caret (^) are handled specially to enable
+// htaccess-like functionality without the need to explicitly disable display
+// of such files
 
 const PREFIX = "http://localhost:4444";
 
"
